text: Omero Antonutti (3 August 1935 â€“ 5 November 2019) was an Italian actor. His best known roles were in Padre Padrone, El Sur, and Carlos Saura in El Dorado. He also played Noah in Genesis: The Creation and the Flood. Antonutti died in Udine on 5 November 2019, at the age of 84, from cancer-related problems. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors
title: Omero Antonutti
